thread.title: Temple looks to NBC's Tamron Hall to replace Cosby on board - Albany Times Union
thread.title_full: Temple looks to NBC's Tamron Hall to replace Cosby on board - Albany Times Union - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Albany Times Union
title: Temple looks to NBC's Tamron Hall to replace Cosby on board - Albany Times Union
text:
In this Dec. 6, 2014 file photo, Tamron Hall arrives at Selma And The Legends That Paved The Way Gala in Goleta, Calif. Temple University trustees are expected to vote next week on naming NBC correspondent Tamron Hall to fill a seat on the board vacated by Bill Cosby last year.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Albany Times Union.
